int binary_search(vector<int>& nums,int target)
{
    int left  = 0;
    int right = nums.size() - 1;
    while(left < right){
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if(nums[mid] > target){
            right = mid - 1;
        }else if(nums[mid] < target){
            left = mid + 1;
        }else{
            return mid;
        }
    }
    return -1;
};

void bubbleSort(vector<int>& nums) {

    }
}
